location.description: Anatomical location where the probe was implanted, often referring to a specific brain area.

device_serial_number.description: Serial number of the specific probe device.

hemisphere.description: Hemisphere in which the probe was implanted.

placement_picture.description: URL to a picture illustrating the probe's placement.

dimension_units.description: Units for probe dimensions (width, height, depth).

owner.description: Institution or entity that owns the probe.

array_rotation.description: Rotation of the array in the counter-clockwise direction in degrees, where 0 degrees is defined by projecting the array onto a sagittal view of the brain with the wire bundle extruding to the anterior direction.
